text:
Money British Airways booking secrets - and the best late deals this week Holiday hunting can be a real chore - especially when you're after a peak time ticket. Here's our guide to booking - and the tricks to saving on your stay Share By Emma Munbodh Molly Holt 12:14, 13 MAR 2017 It's not just the sales that can snap you up a bargain Share Get money updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! According to research, the best time to book a holiday for the most competitive price is 56-days in advance - but what happens when you're travelling last minute? 
British Airways hosts flights to Europe and international luxury destinations all year round - but with flights up in the £1,000s - doing your research can help you save a fortune - especially if you're flying long-haul. 
To help you cut your costs, whether on a family break or a long weekend getaway , here are some handy booking hacks, and our favourite late deals now that winter is well and truly in full swing. Read More The hacks to find a cheap holiday 1. Search the late deals 
Late deals are the most popular way to save on a flights and hotels - as airlines rush to fill spaces and hotel rooms last minute. 
See our pick of the best British Airways late packages this week below, including four-star breaks to Spain and Southern France where temperatures are high over British autumn. Best British Airways late deals this week 
If you're after an quick break, here's our pick of the best late BA deals this week. All the below holiday deals must be booked by March 23rd. For more late deals, see our last minute holidays round up . 
Edinburgh from £119 - CITY - two nights at the 4* Holiday Inn Edinburgh , travelling April 1 to April 30. Includes return flights from Gatwick and accommodation. Book here. 
Nice from £119 - SUN - two nights at the 4* Hotel Colette (Ex Interhotel Atlas) , travelling April 1 to April 30. Includes return flights from Gatwick and accommodation. Book here. 
Cancun from £979 - LONG-HAUL - seven nights at the 4* Allegro Playacar , travelling June 1 to June 30. Includes return flights from Gatwick and all-inclusive accommodation. Book here. 
Barcelona from £129 - CITY - two nights at the 3* Holiday Inn Express Barcelona - Molins de Rei, travelling March 26 to April 30. Includes return flights from Gatwick and accommodation with breakfast. Book here. 
New York from £659 - LONG-HAUL - three nights at the 4* Millennium One UN , travelling April 20 to May 1. Includes return flights from Heathrow and accommodation. Book here. 
Jamaica from £969 - LONG-HAUL - seven nights at the 3* Rooms on the Beach , travelling on selected dates in April. Includes return flights from Gatwick and accommodation. Book here. 
Miami from £769 - LONG-HAUL - five nights at the 3.5* Deauville Beach Resort , travelling April 20 to May 31. Includes return flights from Heathrow and accommodation. Book here. 
Larnaca, Cyprus from £259 - SUN - seven nights at the 3* Petrou Bros Hotelapts , travelling April 18 to May 17. Includes return flights from Heathrow and accommodation. Book here. 
Johannesburg from £749 - LONG-HAUL - five nights at the 3* Holiday Inn Express Sandton-Woodmead , travelling on selected dates in April. Includes return flights from Heathrow and accommodation. Book here. 
Malta from £259 - SUN - seven nights at the 3* Porto Azzurro Aparthotel , travelling April 18 to May 18. Includes return flights from Gatwick and accommodation. Book here. 
Dubai from £449 - LONG-HAUL - three nights at the 4* Winchester Hotel Apartment , travelling on selected dates in April. Includes return flights from Heathrow and accommodation. Book here. Read More USA uncovered: British Airways cabin crew share their American city secrets and tips 2. Keep an eye out for sales 
Many savvy holiday makers sit tight for the sales to hit to book their escape - you can follow which airlines are hosting flight sales here. 
The Big British Airways sales tend to drop around June, September, December and towards the end of January. But there's always offers on so if you've missed out, view their late deals for competitive deals as airlines rush to fill seats last minute.
